divs: Sighting DetailsThe sky was clear blue with scattered clouds. The object was at my 11:00 position but very high over head. We are in a landing pattern for Newark Airport but it was too high for a jet, helicopter or the like. The object appeared all of a sudden. It appeared to have a reflective surface as the part that I could see seemed to be reflecting sunlight, as the sun was almost overhead at that time. The object moved from my left to my right and then it stopped and moved back again in a zig-zag pattern. It seemed to stop and hover for a split second but it was hard to tell. It was very high up as I could see conventional airliners heading to the airport. It was there for about 5 minutes then I did not see it again. I went and got my camera but it was gone by then.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Bloomfield
There were no other sightings in Bloomfield on or around September 11th 2010
Summary: The object was high in the sky and the object moved in a zig-zag pattern.
